name: Eula
storytext: It's but a game. I won't hold a grudge should luck happen to be on your side.
source: Reward for inviting Eula to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Icetide Vortex

skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. If this character has not yet gained <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grimheart</color>, they will gain <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grimheart</color>.

skills.name: Glacial Illumination
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, summons 1 Lightfall Sword.
